title: PlantPass: Spring Plant Fair Checkout and Revenue Tracking Application
type: UIUC Hort Club Spring Plant Fair
description: Developing a lightweight React application for the Spring Plant Fair checkout station, streamlining payment workflows, configurable sales options, and real‑time analytics. The system has already supported 700+ transactions totaling $11K+ with zero downtime, and I'm continuing to expand its usability, including a new Barcode Scan feature for 2026. A key focus is refining the interface for non‑technical volunteers to improve efficiency during high‑traffic events.

title: GameScope: Video game recommendation platform
description: GameScope is a web application designed to provide personalized video game recommendations based on user preferences and gameplay history. By utilizing machine learning algorithms, GameScope analyzes user data to suggest games that align with individual tastes, providing targeted game discovery.

title: Development of a Machine Learning Model for Predicting Plant Traits Using High-Resolution Sensor Data from TERRA-REF
description: I built a machine learning model to predict plant traits from high-resolution TERRA-REF sensor data, identifying features linked to biomass and growth in Sorghum bicolor. This work demonstrates how data-driven approaches can optimize crop performance and reveal genotype responses to the environment.

title: AgroDetect: Crop Disease & Pest Tracker
description: A full-stack web app that helps farmers identify crop damage using image uploads and machine learning. Tracks pest and disease spread via location data, enabling real-time alerts and regional insights. Built with TensorFlow, Flask, MongoDB, and JavaScript.
